review: Friendly and respectful in her professional conduct. Gives a sense of confidence to the patient, and works very efficiently.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Sharada Gowda treated the root canal for my son (11 years). She was very patient while treating and answered all his questions. This gave him comfort during the entire treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am thrilled about Doctor’s handling the issues so nicely and the way of her treating the painful process to make it painless. Nice behaviour coupled with proper advice are some of her traits. All the Doctors and support executives are well behaved and pleasant.

Overall, nice dental clinic and I really will recommend as and when such situations arise. My experience is great.

tags: None
review:
She has been so gentle during the entire process. She spoke to me for almost 30 mins before starting the procedure. Her explaining was very logical, easy to understand and to the point. The treatment went really well. 
One thing I would like to mention about the clinic is the neatness and cleanliness. I haven't seen so much neatness anywhere before and for that reason I would recommend the Dr and the clinic to everyone

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ******* i was a little late to reach the clinic dr.sharda was kind enough to treat me she was very friendly and explained about the treatment and patient enough, like the hospitality and the staff is friendly and welcoming i would return again in future to this clinic  and recomend this place for any dental issues good job

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
********* ******* I had gone for a root canal treatment. Went smoothly and without any pain. Very helpful before / during and after the procedure. Explained everything very calmly and process was completed smoothly.
I would highly recommend you to to visit once for any dental problems.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I got route canal for one tooth and few other filings. Dr. keeps informed about the scenarios and advises legitimately. The technology and materials used are advanced. Quality of work has precision. Cap fitted well at first instance itself. American Dental Practices seems costlier that others in the vicinity but one is surely in safe hands and experience is commensurate.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This was my second visit and i was very happy to walk out with a good smile, i was here for my smile correction and dr sharada gowda did a good Job, with the veeners she very friendly and polite she explained the procedure step by step.. wish they had the option to post the before and after picture of my procedure, kind and friendly staff, good ambience and easy to locate.. highly recommend this place

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is so friendly that you can share your minutest difficulties also. She explains it very well and makes you feel very comfortable.l am very happy that my 87 year old mom felt very  comfortable in her presence. She has a lot of patience to explain the details again .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Bhavin ,Dr Sharda and their staff are truly a Team. All i can say is they are truly professional and straight forward. They are open on a sunday and this is the best thing a working professional can expect, as it is for our convenience. I am very happy and pleased by their work. Highly recommend this clinic for your all tooth problems!!
